response:
"warum gibt es immer noch firmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten nicht schützen? ich finde es skandalös, dass wir unsere daten preisgeben müssen, um bestimmte dienste nutzen zu können. #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "why are there still companies that don't protect our personal data? i find it outrageous that we have to surrender our data to use certain services. #dataprivacy #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of data privacy and the fact that many companies still do not adequately protect personal information. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations about these topics on twitter.
